name: EndlessFall
description: ENDLESS, so the main goal is to beat your last record. Why should you play it? This game is free to play (no money required). Also, you can play it in a browser at any time without downloading any files. What should you check out? This game has a unique jump mechanic. If you'll learn how to control it, nothing will stop you. For people who read this all, I'll give a small hint: "Sometimes you need to go off the track to win."
